full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THEG PA CHEN PO'I GSO SBYONG GI SDOM PA GZHAN LA 'BOGS PA DANG RANG GIS LEN TSUL GSAL BAR BKOD PA SKAL BZANG 'JUG NGOGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,THEG CHEN GSO SBYONG THOG MAR BLA MA LAS BLANGS TE BSRUNG TSUL GYI BRGYUD RIM NI, RGYAL DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO YAN RJE DE NYID KYI GSAN YIG TU THUGS RJE CHEN PO BCU GCIG ZHAL GYI DBANG GI BRGYUD PA DANG BSDEBS GCIG TU BRGYUD TSUL BYUNG BA LTAR LA, ,DA NAS,  PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA SKYABS MGON BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES DBANG PO, SKYES MCHOG LO CHEN SPRUL SKU RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN, SNGAGS CHEN ZHAL SNGA NAS RDO RJE 'CHANG BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS DPAL BZANG PO, ,DES DAG DAM TSIG RDO RJE LA DGYES BZHIN DU GNANG BA LAGS SO, ,ZHES PA'ANG GONG BSTUN DU BKOD PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,
